chapters.name: Rational Numbers
chapters.theme: Properties and operations of rational numbers
learning_outcomes: Represents rational numbers and identifies their position on number line.
Performs operations on rational numbers and simplifies.

chapters.name: Linear Equations in One Variable
key_topics: Equations with variables on one or both sides
learning_outcomes: Solves linear equations involving brackets and fractions.
Formulates and solves word problems using linear equations.

chapters.name: Understanding Quadrilaterals
key_topics: Special quadrilaterals: parallelogram, rhombus, rectangle, square, kite
learning_outcomes: Finds interior angle sum of polygons.
Identifies and uses properties of special quadrilaterals.

chapters.name: Practical Geometry
key_topics: Constructing quadrilaterals with given conditions (sides, angles, diagonals)
learning_outcomes: Constructs quadrilaterals using ruler and compass given required data.
Verifies properties of constructed quadrilaterals.

chapters.name: Data Handling
learning_outcomes: Computes central tendency measures for given data.
Represents data using suitable graph and interprets it.

chapters.name: Squares and Square Roots
key_topics: Finding squares by formula and patterns
Finding square roots by prime factorisation and division method
learning_outcomes: Identifies perfect squares up to a reasonable limit.
Finds square roots of perfect squares using methods learnt.

chapters.name: Cubes and Cube Roots
chapters.theme: Cubes and cube roots of numbers
learning_outcomes: Recognises perfect cubes and their cube roots.
Uses cubes and cube roots in simple problems.

chapters.name: Comparing Quantities
chapters.theme: Percent, discount, profit-loss, tax and compound interest
key_topics: Simple compound interest (two years, three years)
learning_outcomes: Solves problems involving percentage change.
Computes profit, loss, discount and simple compound interest.

chapters.name: Algebraic Expressions and Identities
key_topics: Addition, subtraction and multiplication of expressions
learning_outcomes: Multiplies algebraic expressions systematically.
Applies identities to simplify and compute quickly.

chapters.name: Visualising Solid Shapes
learning_outcomes: Matches solids with nets and views.
Describes cross-sections formed by cutting solids.

chapters.name: Mensuration
key_topics: Area of trapezium and special quadrilaterals
Surface area and volume of cube and cuboid
learning_outcomes: Finds surface area and volume of basic 3D solids.
Solves word problems involving mixed shapes.

chapters.name: Exponents and Powers
learning_outcomes: Uses laws of exponents to simplify expressions.
Expresses very large and very small numbers in standard form.

chapters.name: Direct and Inverse Proportions
learning_outcomes: Identifies situations of direct and inverse proportion.
Solves numerical problems based on proportional reasoning.

chapters.name: Factorisation
learning_outcomes: Factorises simple algebraic expressions.
Checks factorisation by back multiplication.

chapters.name: Introduction to Graphs
learning_outcomes: Plots ordered pairs on Cartesian plane.
Interprets simple line graphs representing real data.

chapters.name: Playing with Numbers
chapters.theme: Patterns and divisibility in number system
learning_outcomes: Represents numbers algebraically using digits.
Solves simple puzzles using divisibility and patterns.
